sentences.en: Bursting into the " inner sanctum , " they nearly startled Mrs. Lin out of her wits.
sentences.cn: 跑进 “ 内宅 ” 的时候,林大娘看见了倒吓一跳.

sentences.en: He withdrew to his sanctum sanctorum, where the children could never go.
sentences.cn: 他撤退到圣所, 而孩子们从未到过这里.

sentences.en: I was allowed once into his inner sanctum.
sentences.cn: 我有一次获准进入他的内室.

sentences.en: I will not wait until the troops break into my inner sanctum to attempt this.
sentences.cn: 我绝不会等到敌人杀进指挥室时才准备逃走.

sentences.en: In the inner sanctum she is represented by a mirror ( her body ).
sentences.cn: 圣殿内放着一面镜子,那便是她的化身.

sentences.en: Know that Diablo's innermost sanctum is hidden by five seals.
sentences.cn: 要知道迪亚波罗最深处的圣殿隐藏在五个封印之后.

sentences.en: Looking sour , Mr. Lin walked into the " inner sanctum. "
sentences.cn: 林先生哭丧着脸,走回 “ 内宅 ” 去.

sentences.en: My presence in his sanctum was evidently esteemed a piece of impudence too shameful for remark.
sentences.cn: 我在他的圣地出现,显然被他看作是羞于提及的莽撞事情.

sentences.en: Occasionally she would be allowed into the inner sanctum of his office.
sentences.cn: 偶尔她也获准进入他那私密的办公室。

sentences.en: On the walls of the god's sanctum are two rare depictions of Vishnu as the Buddha.
sentences.cn: 对墙上的神的不快的是两个罕见的vishnu为佛祖.

sentences.en: She once allowed me into her inner sanctum .
sentences.cn: 有一次她让我进入她的内室。

sentences.en: The clubhouse was their sanctum sanctorum.
sentences.cn: 俱乐部是他们的安静之所.

words.tran_cn: 避难所；至圣所；耶路撒冷的神殿

trans.tran_en: a holy place inside a temple
